io.micrometer.core.instrument.distribution

Interface Histogram

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NoopHistogram, TimeWindowFixedBoundaryHistogram, TimeWindowPercentileHistogram

    public interface Histogram
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    The contract for histograms used to generate distribution statistics for Timer and DistributionSummary.
    Since:
    1.0.3
